verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For the darkness covers the earth,
And gross darkness all the people
But the Lord shall arise upon thee,
And His glory shall be seen upon thee.
He's your light, He's your light,
He will guide you through the darkest night,
He will guide you through the darkest night,
He's your light, and He shines through you and me.
For a thousand shall fall at thy side,
And ten thousand at thy right hand,
But I'm not afraid of the terror by night
Nor the arrow that flies by the day.
He's alive, He's alive,
He has conquered death; we shall do the same!
He has conquered death; we shall do the same!
He's alive, and He lives in you and me!
